trans-unit.source: Exercise – Modify Production Structure to Include Recipes

seg-source.mrk: Exercise – Modify Production Structure to Include Recipes

trans-unit.source: Change the components on the Production Structure for item P-10002 to calculate the following share percentages:

seg-source.mrk: Change the components on the Production Structure for item P-10002 to calculate the following share percentages:

trans-unit.source: Select the New Production BOM and New Routing check boxes and then certify the Production Structure. Update the Net Weight on the Item Card for P-10002 to 25 kg.

seg-source.mrk: Select the New Production BOM and New Routing check boxes and then certify the Production Structure.
Update the Net Weight on the Item Card for P-10002 to 25 kg.

trans-unit.source: Manually create a firm planned production order for item P-10002 and check the components. Change the Net Weight on the Item Card to 20, refresh the production order and verify the changes on the components.

seg-source.mrk: Manually create a firm planned production order for item P-10002 and check the components.
Change the Net Weight on the Item Card to 20, refresh the production order and verify the changes on the components.

trans-unit.source: Modify the Production Structure

seg-source.mrk: Modify the Production Structure

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to modify the Production Structure for item P-10002 to include recipes rather than items:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to modify the Production Structure for item P-10002 to include recipes rather than items:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click Departments > Manufacturing > Product Design > Production Structures.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click Departments > Manufacturing > Product Design > Production Structures.

trans-unit.source: Locate and open the production structure for item P-10002.

seg-source.mrk: Locate and open the production structure for item P-10002.

trans-unit.source: Change the Status to Under Development.

seg-source.mrk: Change the Status to Under Development.

trans-unit.source: On the first line, change the Type field to Share of Recipe.

seg-source.mrk: On the first line, change the Type field to Share of Recipe.

trans-unit.source: In the No. field, enter P-30008.

seg-source.mrk: In the No.
field, enter P-30008.

trans-unit.source: In the Share % field, type 65.

seg-source.mrk: In the Share % field, type 65.

trans-unit.source: On the next line, change the Type field to Share of Recipe.

seg-source.mrk: On the next line, change the Type field to Share of Recipe.

trans-unit.source: In the No. field, enter P-30009.

seg-source.mrk: In the No.
field, enter P-30009.

trans-unit.source: In the Share % field, type 35.

seg-source.mrk: In the Share % field, type 35.

trans-unit.source: On the General FastTab, select the New Production BOM and New Routing check boxes.

seg-source.mrk: On the General FastTab, select the New Production BOM and New Routing check boxes.

trans-unit.source: Change the Status to Certified.

seg-source.mrk: Change the Status to Certified.

trans-unit.source: In the Production Structure Details FactBox, click Item No. P-10002 to open the Item Card.

seg-source.mrk: In the Production Structure Details FactBox, click Item No.
P-10002 to open the Item Card.

trans-unit.source: On the Replenishment FastTab, type 25 in the Net Weight field.

seg-source.mrk: On the Replenishment FastTab, type 25 in the Net Weight field.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Item Card and then click OK to close the Production Structure page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Item Card and then click OK to close the Production Structure page.

trans-unit.source: Create the Production Order and Verify the Setup

seg-source.mrk: Create the Production Order and Verify the Setup

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create the production order and verify the results:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create the production order and verify the results:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, under Manufacturing, click Execution > Firm Planned Prod. Orders.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, under Manufacturing, click <span class="Bold">Execution > Firm Planned Prod.
Orders.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New.

trans-unit.source: Press ENTER to insert a new production order number.

seg-source.mrk: Press ENTER to insert a new production order number.

trans-unit.source: In the Source No. field, enter P-10002.

seg-source.mrk: In the Source No.
field, enter P-10002.

trans-unit.source: In the Quantity field, type 1.

seg-source.mrk: In the Quantity field, type 1.

trans-unit.source: Expand the Posting FastTab and enter MAINWH in the Location Code field.

seg-source.mrk: Expand the Posting FastTab and enter MAINWH in the Location Code field.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Refresh Production Order.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Refresh Production Order.

trans-unit.source: In the Refresh Production Order batch job, click OK.

seg-source.mrk: In the Refresh Production Order batch job, click OK.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Components.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Components.

trans-unit.source: : Prod. Order Components page with planned recipe weights

seg-source.mrk: : Prod.
Order Components page with planned recipe weights

trans-unit.source: The total Quantity per of the two items equals 25 and each is calculated at the correct percentage as entered on the Production Structure.

seg-source.mrk: The total Quantity per of the two items equals 25 and each is calculated at the correct percentage as entered on the Production Structure.

trans-unit.source: Close the Prod. Order Components page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the <span class="Bold">Prod.
Order Components page.

trans-unit.source: In the Source No. field, click the arrow and then click Advanced to open the Item List.

seg-source.mrk: In the Source No.
field, click the arrow and then click Advanced to open the Item List.

trans-unit.source: With item P-10002 selected, click Edit on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: With item P-10002 selected, click Edit on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: On the Replenishment FastTab, change the Net Weight and Recipe Weight fields to 20.

seg-source.mrk: On the Replenishment FastTab, change the Net Weight and Recipe Weight fields to 20.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Item Card and then click OK to close the Item List page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Item Card and then click OK to close the Item List page.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Refresh Production Order.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Refresh Production Order.

trans-unit.source: In the Refresh Production Order batch job, click OK.

seg-source.mrk: In the Refresh Production Order batch job, click OK.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Components.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Components.

trans-unit.source: : Prod. Order Components page with re-planned recipe weights

seg-source.mrk: : Prod.
Order Components page with re-planned recipe weights

trans-unit.source: The total Quantity per of the two items equals 20 and each is calculated at the correct percentage as entered on the Production Structure.

seg-source.mrk: The total Quantity per of the two items equals 20 and each is calculated at the correct percentage as entered on the Production Structure.

trans-unit.source: Close the Prod. Order Components and Firm Planned Prod. Order pages.

seg-source.mrk: Close the <span class="Bold">Prod.
Order Components and Firm Planned Prod.
Order pages.
